file_content.text: You get those supplies the boss asked for?
Fa'athra's goons are out there puttin' holes in anything that moves! I'm not going anywhere!
This your first turf war? You want to get paid or not?
I want to keep breathing more.
Breathing the air is as likely to kill you as Fa'athra's boys are.
Buy a blaster, learn the routes through town. Just don't let the boss hear you dodging work because of a few gangsters.
